page.title: 15South Yorkshire Caravans
page.content: This firm, established in 1972 for exporting and transporting{caravans,} started to retail caravans in 1980. The site,2 miles from the M1, provides easy access to the{motorway.}The firm is a family business and Mr. Doherty, the managing director,employs 28 staff including sales and administration staff. 9 types of{tourers}are sold. He has 100 new and 200 used caravans. In 1980 he had 20 caravans. The most expensive van is Â£8000, the cheapest Â£200. 1000 vans are sold each year. Caravan accessories, boats, outboard motors, dinghies, awnings and tents are also sold. Advertising is by television, radio, newspapers, caravan magazines, exhibitions and shows. Caravans are bought from manufacturers or in part exchange. Future expansion includes a new showroom, a garden centre and the sale of{static vans.
